string-array.name: recipes
string-array.item: Charred Leeks With Honey and Vinegar

string-array.name: description
string-array.item: Chicken filled with ham and swiss cheese, topped with bread crumbs.
Macaroni with tuna in cream of chicken soup sauce with cheese and fried onions.
Ramen noodles topped with ground beef, tomato, and corn.
Creamy cheese ravioli with smoked gouda.
Chicken breast topped with basil pesto and prosciutto.
Butternut squash baked with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Charred turnips coated in miso, butter, sugar, pepper, and lemon.
Leeks glazed in vinegar, honey, and olive oil.
Sauteed collard greens, bacon, and onions seasoned with chili and salt.
Soft boiled eggs topped with pepperoncini, parsley, mayonnaise, paprika, and salt.
Spaghetti with butter cream sauce spiced topped with salt, pepper, and lemon.
Fresh cut bun filled with jarred giadiniera, mayonnaise, tomatoes, lettuces, salt, and pepper.
Tomatoes cooked in butter with ginger, scallions, and soy sauce. Serve on toast.

string-array.name: ingredients
string-array.item:
Ingredients:

macaroni
tuna
cream of chicken soup
cheddar cheese
friend onions
